00078 ParticleFilter::ParticleFilter(Signal *signal, SHModel *model, APrioriDensity aPriori, LikelihoodDensity likelihood, ImportanceDensity importance,
00079                                const std::string maskFileName, Image::SizeType size, Image::PointType origin, Image::SpacingType spacing,
00080                                unsigned int M, Point x0, Real epsilon, Real stepSize, unsigned int maxLength) :
00081         m_aPriori(aPriori), m_likelihood(likelihood), m_importance(importance)
00082 {
00083     std::cout << "\tInitializing filter..." << std::endl;
00084 
00085     m_k         = 0;
00086     m_epsilon   = epsilon;
00087     m_M         = M;
00088     m_stepSize  = stepSize;
00089     m_maxLength = maxLength;
00090     m_origin    = origin;
00091     m_spacing   = spacing;
00092     m_model     = model;
00093     m_signal    = signal;
00094     m_dirNum    = 1;
00095     m_kx        = m_stepSize/m_spacing[0];
00096     m_ky        = m_stepSize/m_spacing[1];
00097     m_kz        = m_stepSize/m_spacing[2];
00098     m_lps       = false;
00099 
00100     m_vStepSize.push_back(m_kx);
00101     m_vStepSize.push_back(m_ky);
00102     m_vStepSize.push_back(m_kz);
00103 
00104     std::cout << "\t\tFilter will use " << M << " particles." << std::endl;
00105     std::cout << "\t\tResampling treshold is set as " << epsilon << "." << std::endl;
00106     std::cout << "\t\tThe moving step is fixed at " << m_stepSize << " mm." << std::endl;
00107     std::cout << "\t\tThere will be " << m_maxLength << " steps." << std::endl;
00108 
00109 
00110     // Initialize random number generator
00111     std::srand(std::time(NULL));
00112 
00113 
00114     // Create density map
00115     m_map = Image::New();
00116     m_map->SetRegions(size);
00117     m_map->SetOrigin(origin);
00118     m_map->SetSpacing(spacing);
00119     m_map->SetDirection(m_model->GetDirection());
00120     m_map->Allocate();
00121     m_map->FillBuffer(0);
00122 
00123     itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00124     worldPoint[0] = x0.x(); worldPoint[1] = x0.y(); worldPoint[2] = x0.z();
00125 
00126     itk::ContinuousIndex<Real,3> continuousIndex;
00127     if(!m_map->TransformPhysicalPointToContinuousIndex(worldPoint, continuousIndex))
00128     {
00129         std::cout << "Error: continuous index not in image !" << std::endl;
00130         std::cerr << "(" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ") --> (" << continuousIndex[0] << "," << continuousIndex[1] << "," << continuousIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl;
00131         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00132     }
00133 
00134     m_x0 = Point(continuousIndex[0], continuousIndex[1], continuousIndex[2]);
00135 
00136 
00137     // Read mask image
00138     MaskReader::Pointer reader = MaskReader::New();
00139     reader->SetFileName(maskFileName);
00140     reader->Update();
00141     m_mask = reader->GetOutput();
00142 
00143 
00144     std::cout << "\tdone." << std::endl;
00145 }
00146 
00147 ParticleFilter::ParticleFilter(Signal *signal, SHModel *model, APrioriDensity aPriori, LikelihoodDensity likelihood, ImportanceDensity importance,
00148                                Mask::Pointer mask, Image::SizeType size, Image::PointType origin, Image::SpacingType spacing,
00149                                unsigned int M, Point x0, Real epsilon, Real stepSize, char displaMode) :
00150         m_aPriori(aPriori), m_likelihood(likelihood), m_importance(importance)
00151 {
00152     m_displayMode = displaMode;
00153 
00154 
00155     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tInitializing filter..." << std::endl);
00156 
00157     m_k         = 0;
00158     m_epsilon   = epsilon;
00159     m_M         = M;
00160     m_stepSize  = stepSize;
00161     m_origin    = origin;
00162     m_spacing   = spacing;
00163     m_model     = model;
00164     m_signal    = signal;
00165     m_dirNum    = 1;
00166     m_kx        = m_stepSize/m_spacing[0];
00167     m_ky        = m_stepSize/m_spacing[1];
00168     m_kz        = m_stepSize/m_spacing[2];
00169     m_lps       = false;
00170 
00171     m_vStepSize.push_back(m_kx);
00172     m_vStepSize.push_back(m_ky);
00173     m_vStepSize.push_back(m_kz);
00174 
00175 
00176     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tFilter will use " << M << " particles." << std::endl);
00177     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tResampling treshold is set as " << epsilon << "." << std::endl);
00178     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tThe moving step is fixed at " << m_stepSize << " mm." << std::endl);
00179 
00180 
00181     // Initialize random number generator
00182     std::srand(std::time(NULL));
00183 
00184 
00185     // Create density map
00186     m_map = Image::New();
00187     m_map->SetRegions(size);
00188     m_map->SetOrigin(origin);
00189     m_map->SetSpacing(spacing);
00190     m_map->SetDirection(m_model->GetDirection());
00191     m_map->Allocate();
00192     m_map->FillBuffer(0);
00193 
00194     itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00195     worldPoint[0] = x0.x(); worldPoint[1] = x0.y(); worldPoint[2] = x0.z();
00196 
00197     itk::ContinuousIndex<Real,3> continuousIndex;
00198     if(!m_map->TransformPhysicalPointToContinuousIndex(worldPoint, continuousIndex))
00199     {
00200         std::cout << "Error: continuous index not in image !" << std::endl;
00201         std::cerr << "(" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ") --> (" << continuousIndex[0] << "," << continuousIndex[1] << "," << continuousIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl;
00202         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00203     }
00204 
00205     m_x0 = Point(continuousIndex[0], continuousIndex[1], continuousIndex[2]);
00206 
00207     m_mask = mask;
00208 
00209 
00210     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tdone." << std::endl);
00211 }
00212 
00213 void ParticleFilter::run(int label)
00214 {
00215     //
00216     // Initialization
00217     //
00218 
00219     // Get max direction à starting point
00220     std::vector<Direction> initDir = m_model->getMaxDirectionsAt(m_x0);
00221 
00222     // Find maximal direction
00223     Direction maxDir;
00224     Real maxValue = 0;
00225 
00226     for(std::vector<Direction>::iterator it=initDir.begin(); it != initDir.end(); it++)
00227     {
00228         Real tmp = m_model->odfAt(*it, m_x0);
00229 
00230         if(maxValue < tmp)
00231         {
00232             maxValue = tmp;
00233             maxDir   = *it;
00234         }
00235     }
00236 
00237     // Compute Symetric direction
00238     Direction symDir(
00239         M_PI - maxDir.theta(),
00240         (maxDir.phi() < M_PI) ? maxDir.phi() + M_PI : maxDir.phi() - M_PI
00241     );
00242 
00243 
00244     //
00245     // Filtering
00246     //
00247 
00248     this->run(label, maxDir);
00249     this->ComputeMap();
00250     Particle map1 = this->GetMAP();
00251 
00252     this->run(label, symDir);
00253     this->ComputeMap();
00254     Particle map2 = this->GetMAP();
00255 
00256     if(map1.length() + map2.length() > 2)
00257         this->ComputeFiber(map1,map2);
00258 }
00259 
00260 void ParticleFilter::run(int label, Direction dir)
00261 {
00262     m_k     = 0;
00263     m_cloud = std::vector<Particle>(m_M, Particle(m_x0));
00264 
00265 
00266     //
00267     // Initial sampling (vMF in mean direction dir and a priori kappa)
00268     //
00269 
00270     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tBegin initial sampling..." << std::flush);
00271 
00272 
00273     Real *weights    = new Real[m_M];
00274     unsigned int nbInsPart = m_M;
00275 
00276 
00277     #pragma omp parallel for
00278     for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00279     {
00280         // Simulate a direction using initial density
00281         Direction u0 = m_importance.simulate(dir,m_importance.computeConcentration(dir,m_x0));
00282 
00283         // Move particle
00284         bool isInside = m_cloud[m].addToPath(u0.toVector()*m_stepSize, m_mask);
00285 
00286         // Set the initial weight of the particle
00287         if(isInside == 0 || isInside == 2) // outside mask or in exclusion zone
00288         {
00289             nbInsPart--;
00290             m_cloud[m].setActive(false);
00291         }
00292     } // for i
00293 
00294     Real w    = 1.0/(Real)m_M;
00295 
00296     #pragma omp parallel for
00297     for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00298     {
00299         weights[m] = w;
00300         m_cloud[m].setWeight(w);
00301     }
00302 
00303 //    this->saveCloudInVTK(label, m_k, m_x0);
00304 
00305     m_k++;
00306 
00307     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00308 
00309 
00310     //
00311     // Sequential sampling
00312     //
00313 
00314 
00315     while(nbInsPart > 0)
00316     {
00317         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tBegin sampling " << m_k << "..." << std::flush);
00318 
00319         #pragma omp parallel for
00320         for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00321         {
00322             if(m_cloud[m].isActive()) // m is active
00323             {
00324                 // Informations about current particle
00325                 Direction ukm1 = m_cloud[m].lastVector().toDirection();
00326                 Point xk       = m_cloud[m].lastPoint();
00327 
00328                 // Simulating next direction according importance density
00329                 Direction mu = m_importance.computeMeanDirection(xk, ukm1);
00330                 Real kappa   = mu.isNull() ? m_aPriori.getConcentration() : m_importance.computeConcentration(mu,xk);
00331                 Direction uk = mu.isNull() ? m_importance.simulate(ukm1, kappa) : m_importance.simulate(mu, kappa);
00332 
00333                 // Move particle
00334                 m_cloud[m].addToPath(uk.toVector()*m_stepSize, m_mask);
00335 
00336                 // Compute particle's weight
00337                 if(mu.isNull())
00338                 {
00339                     Real apriori    = m_aPriori.compute(uk, ukm1);
00340                     Real importance = m_importance.compute(uk, ukm1, kappa);
00341                     m_cloud[m].addLikelihood(0);
00342 
00343                     weights[m] = std::exp( std::log(m_cloud[m].weight()) + apriori - importance );
00344                 }
00345                 else // mu is not null
00346                 {
00347                     Real likelihood = m_likelihood.compute(uk, xk, mu);
00348                     Real apriori    = m_aPriori.compute(uk, ukm1);
00349                     Real importance = m_importance.compute(uk, mu, kappa);
00350                     m_cloud[m].addLikelihood(likelihood);
00351 
00352                     weights[m] = std::exp( std::log(m_cloud[m].weight()) + likelihood + apriori - importance );
00353                 }
00354 
00355                 if(!std::isfinite(weights[m]) || std::isnan(weights[m]))
00356                     weights[m] = 0;
00357             }
00358         } // for i particles
00359 
00360         // Compute the sum of particles' weight
00361         Real sum   = 0;
00362 
00363         for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00364         {
00365             if(m_cloud[m].isActive()) // m is active
00366             {
00367                 sum += weights[m];
00368             }
00369         } // for each particle
00370 
00371         if(sum <= 0.0)
00372             sum = 1;
00373         assert(sum > 0.0);
00374 
00375         // Normalize particles' weights
00376         #pragma omp parallel for
00377         for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00378         {
00379             if(m_cloud[m].isActive()) // m is active
00380             {
00381                 assert(weights[m]/sum >= 0.0);
00382                 m_cloud[m].setWeight(weights[m]/sum);
00383             }
00384         }
00385 
00386 
00387         // Compute sum square of particles' weights
00388         Real sumSquare = 0;
00389         for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00390         {
00391             if(m_cloud[m].isActive()) // m is active
00392             {
00393                 sumSquare += m_cloud[m].weight() * m_cloud[m].weight();
00394             }
00395         }
00396 
00397         // Compute resampling threshold
00398         Real ESS = 1.0 / sumSquare;
00399 
00400         if(!std::isfinite(ESS))
00401             nbInsPart = 0;
00402         else
00403         {
00404             // Resample if ESS is below a threshold
00405             // keeping proportionnality of weights
00406             if(ESS < m_epsilon*(nbInsPart))
00407             {
00408                 Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << " (Resampling, ESS = " << (ESS/nbInsPart)*100.0 << "%) " << std::flush);
00409                 this->ResampleCloud(nbInsPart);
00410             }
00411             else // ESS >= m_epsilon*(nbInsPart)
00412                 Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << " (ESS = " << (ESS/nbInsPart)*100.0 << "%) " << std::flush);
00413 
00414 
00415             for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00416             {
00417                 if(m_cloud[m].isOutside() && m_cloud[m].isActive())
00418                 {
00419                     m_cloud[m].setActive(false);
00420                     nbInsPart--;
00421                 }
00422             }
00423 
00424         }
00425 
00426 //        this->saveCloudInVTK(label, m_k, m_x0);
00427 
00428         m_k++;
00429 
00430         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00431     } // while there are active particles or for k steps
00432 
00433     delete[] weights;
00434 
00435 //    this->saveCloudInVTK(label, m_k-1, m_x0);
00436 
00437     m_dirNum++;
00438 }
00439 
00440 void ParticleFilter::ResampleCloud(unsigned int nbInsPart)
00441 {
00442     assert(nbInsPart <= m_M);
00443     assert(nbInsPart > 0);
00444 
00445     Real cumul          = 0;
00446     Real *intervals     = new Real[nbInsPart];
00447     unsigned int *index = new unsigned int[nbInsPart];
00448 
00449 
00450     // Create proportionnal intervals
00451     // between 0 and 1 for inside particles
00452     unsigned int count = 0;
00453     for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00454     {
00455         if(m_cloud[m].isActive()) // m is active
00456         {
00457             cumul += m_cloud[m].weight();
00458             intervals[count] = cumul;
00459             index[count] = m;
00460             count++;
00461         }
00462     } // for i
00463 
00464 
00465     Real w    = 1.0/(Real)nbInsPart;
00466 
00467     assert(w >= 0.0);
00468 
00469     // Get M particles from the cloud
00470     // keeping proportionnality
00471     // (multinomial resampling)
00472     for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00473     {
00474         if(m_cloud[m].isActive()) // m is active
00475         {
00476             // Simulate x ~ U(0,1)
00477             Real x = (Real)rand() / (Real)RAND_MAX;
00478 
00479             bool found = false;
00480             unsigned int i = 0;
00481 
00482             do
00483             {
00484                 if(x < intervals[i])
00485                     found = true;
00486                 else
00487                     i++;
00488             } while(!found && i < nbInsPart);
00489 
00490             m_cloud[m].SetLastPoint(m_cloud[index[i]].lastPoint());
00491             m_cloud[m].SetLastVector(m_cloud[index[i]].lastVector());
00492             m_cloud[m].SetLastWeight(w);
00493         }
00494     } // for m
00495 
00496 
00497     // Clean space memory
00498     delete[] index;
00499     delete[] intervals;
00500 }
00501 
00502 
00503 void ParticleFilter::saveCloudInVTK(int label, unsigned int step, Point begin)
00504 {
00505     //
00506     // Build VTK PolyData from particle's cloud
00507     //
00508 
00509     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>       points = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>::New();
00510     vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray>     lines = vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray>::New();
00511     vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray> weights = vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray>::New();
00512 
00513     vtkIdType pid;
00514     double valueWeight = 0;
00515 
00516     weights->SetNumberOfComponents(1);
00517 
00518     // create all points and lines
00519     for(std::vector<Particle>::iterator pIt = m_cloud.begin(); pIt != m_cloud.end(); pIt++)
00520     {
00521         vtkSmartPointer<vtkLine> line = vtkSmartPointer<vtkLine>::New();
00522         ImageContinuousIndex cix;
00523         Image::PointType wx;
00524         unsigned int id = 0;
00525 
00526         Point x0 = pIt->getPoint(0);
00527 
00528         cix[0] = x0.x(); cix[1] = x0.y(); cix[2] = x0.z();
00529         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cix, wx);
00530 
00531         if(m_lps)
00532             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wx[0], wx[1], wx[2]);
00533         else // ras
00534             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wx[0], -wx[1], wx[2]);
00535 
00536         valueWeight = pIt->getWeight(id++);
00537         weights->InsertNextTupleValue(&valueWeight);
00538 
00539         for(unsigned int i=1; i<=pIt->length(); i++)
00540         {
00541             Point xk = pIt->getPoint(i);
00542 
00543             Point xkm1 = pIt->getPoint(i-1);
00544             Vector vk  = pIt->getVector(i-1);
00545             Point p    = xk + vk*(-1);
00546 
00547             if(!(p == xkm1)) // points are note linked
00548             {
00549                 cix[0] = p.x(); cix[1] = p.y(); cix[2] = p.z();
00550                 m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cix, wx);
00551 
00552                 if(m_lps)
00553                     pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wx[0], wx[1], wx[2]);
00554                 else // ras
00555                     pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wx[0], -wx[1], wx[2]);
00556 
00557                 valueWeight = 1.0/m_M;
00558                 weights->InsertNextTupleValue(&valueWeight);
00559             }
00560 
00561             cix[0] = xk.x(); cix[1] = xk.y(); cix[2] = xk.z();
00562             m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cix, wx);
00563 
00564             if(m_lps)
00565             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wx[0], wx[1], wx[2]);
00566             else // ras
00567             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wx[0], -wx[1], wx[2]);
00568 
00569             valueWeight = pIt->getWeight(id++);
00570             weights->InsertNextTupleValue(&valueWeight);
00571 
00572             line->GetPointIds()->SetId(0, pid-1);
00573             line->GetPointIds()->SetId(1, pid);
00574             lines->InsertNextCell(line);
00575         } // for i
00576     } // for each particle
00577 
00578     // create vtk polydata object
00579     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> cloud = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData>::New();
00580     cloud->SetPoints(points);
00581     cloud->SetLines(lines);
00582     cloud->GetPointData()->SetScalars(weights);
00583 
00584 
00585     //
00586     // Save VTK PolyData object into VTK file
00587     //
00588 
00589     std::stringstream filename;
00590     filename << "cloud-" << label << "-" << begin << "-" << m_dirNum << "-" << step << ".vtk";
00591 
00592     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter> writer = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter>::New();
00593     writer->SetInput(cloud);
00594     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00595     writer->Write();
00596 }
00597 
00598 Particle ParticleFilter::GetMAP()
00599 {
00600     Particle map(m_x0);
00601 
00602     if(m_k > 2)
00603     {
00604         unsigned int t = m_k-1;
00605         Real *delta = new Real[t*m_M];
00606         Real *psi   = new Real[(t-1)*m_M];
00607 
00608 
00609         // Compute delta and psi by dynamic programming
00610 
00611         #pragma omp parallel for
00612         for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00613         {
00614 //            if(m_cloud[m].length() > 1)
00615             if(m_cloud[m].length() >= 1)
00616             {
00617                 assert(m_cloud[m].length() >= 1);
00618                 delta[Ind(0,m)] = m_aPriori.compute(m_cloud[m].getVector(1).toDirection(), m_cloud[m].getVector(0).toDirection()) + m_cloud[m].getLikelihood(0);
00619             }
00620             else
00621                 delta[Ind(0,m)] = std::log(1.0/m_M);
00622         }
00623 
00624 
00625         for(unsigned int k=1; k<t; k++)
00626         {
00627             #pragma omp parallel for
00628             for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00629             {
00630                 if(k+1 < m_cloud[m].length())
00631                 {
00632                     Real max          = MIN_REAL;
00633                     unsigned int imax = 0;
00634 
00635                     assert(k+1 <= m_cloud[m].length());
00636                     Point xkp1m = m_cloud[m].getPoint(k+1);
00637 
00638                     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_M; i++)
00639                     {
00640                         if(k < m_cloud[i].length())
00641                         {
00642                             assert(k+1 <= m_cloud[i].length());
00643                             Point xkp1i   = m_cloud[i].getPoint(k+1);
00644                             Real distance = std::sqrt( (xkp1i.x()-xkp1m.x())*(xkp1i.x()-xkp1m.x()) + (xkp1i.y()-xkp1m.y())*(xkp1i.y()-xkp1m.y()) + (xkp1i.z()-xkp1m.z())*(xkp1i.z()-xkp1m.z()));
00645 
00646                             if(distance <= 0.01)
00647                             {
00648                                 assert(k+1 < m_cloud[m].length());
00649                                 assert(k < m_cloud[i].length());
00650                                 Real tmp = delta[Ind(k-1,i)] + m_aPriori.compute(m_cloud[m].getVector(k+1).toDirection(), m_cloud[i].getVector(k).toDirection());
00651 
00652                                 if(tmp > max)
00653                                 {
00654                                     max  = tmp;
00655                                     imax = i;
00656                                 }
00657                             }
00658                         }
00659                     }
00660 
00661                     if(EQUAL(max,MIN_REAL))
00662                     {
00663                         delta[Ind(k,m)] = m_cloud[m].getLikelihood(k);
00664                         psi[Ind(k-1,m)] = m;
00665                     }
00666                     else // max <> MIN_REAL
00667                     {
00668                         delta[Ind(k,m)] = m_cloud[m].getLikelihood(k) + max;
00669                         psi[Ind(k-1,m)] = imax;
00670                     }
00671                 }
00672                 else // k+1 >= m_cloud[m].length()
00673                 {
00674                     if(k == 1)
00675                         delta[Ind(1,m)] = delta[Ind(0,m)];
00676                     else // k > 1
00677                         delta[Ind(k,m)] = delta[Ind(k-1,m)] + std::abs(delta[Ind(k-1,m)] - delta[Ind(k-2,m)]);
00678 
00679                     psi[Ind(k-1,m)] = m;
00680                 }
00681             }
00682         }
00683 
00684 
00685         // Backtracking
00686 
00687         std::vector<Point> points;
00688 
00689         Real max          = MIN_REAL;
00690         unsigned int mmax = 0;
00691 
00692         for(unsigned int m=0; m<m_M; m++)
00693         {
00694             Real tmp = delta[Ind(t-1,m)];
00695 
00696             if(max < tmp)
00697             {
00698                 max  = tmp;
00699                 mmax = m;
00700             }
00701         }
00702 
00703         int len = m_cloud[mmax].length();
00704         points.push_back(m_cloud[mmax].getPoint(len));
00705 
00706         for(int k=t-2; k>=0; k--)
00707         {
00708             mmax = psi[Ind(k,mmax)];
00709 
00710             int len = m_cloud[mmax].length();
00711 
00712             if(k+1 <= len)
00713                 points.push_back(m_cloud[mmax].getPoint(k+1));
00714             else // k+1 > len
00715                 points.push_back(m_cloud[mmax].getPoint(len));
00716         }
00717 
00718 
00719         delete[] psi;
00720         delete[] delta;
00721 
00722 
00723         // Compute MAP estimate
00724 
00725         for(int k=points.size()-1; k>=0; k--)
00726         {
00727             Point p1 = map.lastPoint();
00728             Point p2 = points[k];
00729             Vector v(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y(), p2.z()-p1.z());
00730             map.addToPath(v*m_stepSize, m_mask);
00731             map.setWeight(1);
00732         }
00733     }
00734 
00735 
00736     return map;
00737 }
00738 
00739 double ParticleFilter::ComputeGFA(Point p)
00740 {
00741     Matrix S = m_signal->signalAt(p);
00742 
00743     double average = 0;
00744     for(unsigned int i=0; i<S.Rows(); i++)
00745         average += S(i,0);
00746     average /= S.Rows();
00747 
00748     double std = 0;
00749     for(unsigned int i=0; i<S.Rows(); i++)
00750         std += (S(i,0)-average) * (S(i,0)-average);
00751     std /= S.Rows();
00752     std = std::sqrt(std);
00753 
00754     double rms = 0;
00755     for(unsigned int i=0; i<S.Rows(); i++)
00756         rms += S(i,0) * S(i,0);
00757     rms /= S.Rows();
00758     rms = std::sqrt(rms);
00759 
00760     return std / rms;
00761 }
00762 
00763 void ParticleFilter::ComputeFiber(Particle map1, Particle map2)
00764 {
00765     // VTK structures
00766     m_fiber = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData>::New();
00767 
00768     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>   points = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>::New();
00769     vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray> lines = vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray>::New();
00770     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>   line = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>::New();
00771     vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray> gfa = vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray>::New();
00772 
00773     // Data
00774     vtkIdType pid;
00775     unsigned int id = 0;
00776     double valueGFA = 0;
00777 
00778     ImageContinuousIndex ci;
00779     Image::PointType wp;
00780 
00781 
00782     // Build fiber with the MAP estimate in world coordinates
00783     gfa->SetNumberOfComponents(1);
00784     line->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds(map1.length() + map2.length()/* - 2*/);
00785 
00786     // First point
00787 //    Point p = map1.getPoint(map1.length()-1);
00788     Point p = map1.getPoint(map1.length());
00789     ci[0] = p.x(); ci[1] = p.y(); ci[2] = p.z();
00790     m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(ci,wp);
00791 
00792     if(m_lps)
00793         pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00794     else // ras
00795         pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00796 
00797     valueGFA = this->ComputeGFA(p);
00798     gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00799     line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00800 
00801     // First part
00802 //    for(int k=map1.length()-3; k>=0; k--)
00803     for(int k=map1.length()-2; k>=0; k--)
00804     {
00805         assert(k+2 <= map1.length());
00806         assert(k+1 <= map1.length());
00807         assert(k   <= map1.length());
00808 
00809         Point p1 = map1.getPoint(k+2);
00810         Point p2 = map1.getPoint(k+1);
00811         Point p3 = map1.getPoint(k);
00812 
00813         Image::PointType wp1, wp2, wp3;
00814         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00815 
00816         cip[0] = p1.x(); cip[1] = p1.y(); cip[2] = p1.z();
00817         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp1);
00818         cip[0] = p2.x(); cip[1] = p2.y(); cip[2] = p2.z();
00819         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp2);
00820         cip[0] = p3.x(); cip[1] = p3.y(); cip[2] = p3.z();
00821         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp3);
00822 
00823         if(m_lps)
00824             pid = points->InsertNextPoint( (wp1[0]+wp2[0]+wp3[0])/3.0, (wp1[1]+wp2[1]+wp3[1])/3.0, (wp1[2]+wp2[2]+wp3[2])/3.0 );
00825         else // ras
00826             pid = points->InsertNextPoint( -(wp1[0]+wp2[0]+wp3[0])/3.0, -(wp1[1]+wp2[1]+wp3[1])/3.0, (wp1[2]+wp2[2]+wp3[2])/3.0 );
00827 
00828         valueGFA = this->ComputeGFA(Point( (p1.x()+p2.x()+p3.x())/3.0, (p1.y()+p2.y()+p3.y())/3.0, (p1.z()+p2.z()+p3.z())/3.0 ));
00829         gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00830         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00831     }
00832 
00833     // Middle point
00834     if(map1.length() >= 1 && map2.length() >= 1)
00835     {
00836         assert(1 <= map1.length());
00837         assert(1 <= map2.length());
00838 
00839         Point p1 = map1.getPoint(1);
00840         Point p2 = map2.getPoint(0);
00841         Point p3 = map2.getPoint(1);
00842 
00843         Image::PointType wp1, wp2, wp3;
00844         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00845 
00846         cip[0] = p1.x(); cip[1] = p1.y(); cip[2] = p1.z();
00847         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp1);
00848         cip[0] = p2.x(); cip[1] = p2.y(); cip[2] = p2.z();
00849         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp2);
00850         cip[0] = p3.x(); cip[1] = p3.y(); cip[2] = p3.z();
00851         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp3);
00852 
00853         if(m_lps)
00854             pid = points->InsertNextPoint( (wp1[0]+wp2[0]+wp3[0])/3.0, (wp1[1]+wp2[1]+wp3[1])/3.0, (wp1[2]+wp2[2]+wp3[2])/3.0 );
00855         else // ras
00856             pid = points->InsertNextPoint( -(wp1[0]+wp2[0]+wp3[0])/3.0, -(wp1[1]+wp2[1]+wp3[1])/3.0, (wp1[2]+wp2[2]+wp3[2])/3.0 );
00857 
00858         valueGFA = this->ComputeGFA(Point( (p1.x()+p2.x()+p3.x())/3.0, (p1.y()+p2.y()+p3.y())/3.0, (p1.z()+p2.z()+p3.z())/3.0 ));
00859         gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00860         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00861     }
00862 
00863 
00864     // Last part
00865 //    for(unsigned int k=2; k<map2.length(); k++)
00866     for(unsigned int k=2; k<=map2.length(); k++)
00867     {
00868         assert(k-2 <= map2.length());
00869         assert(k-1 <= map2.length());
00870         assert(k   <= map2.length());
00871 
00872         Point p1 = map2.getPoint(k-2);
00873         Point p2 = map2.getPoint(k-1);
00874         Point p3 = map2.getPoint(k);
00875 
00876         Image::PointType wp1, wp2, wp3;
00877         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00878 
00879         cip[0] = p1.x(); cip[1] = p1.y(); cip[2] = p1.z();
00880         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp1);
00881         cip[0] = p2.x(); cip[1] = p2.y(); cip[2] = p2.z();
00882         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp2);
00883         cip[0] = p3.x(); cip[1] = p3.y(); cip[2] = p3.z();
00884         m_map->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp3);
00885 
00886         if(m_lps)
00887             pid = points->InsertNextPoint( (wp1[0]+wp2[0]+wp3[0])/3.0, (wp1[1]+wp2[1]+wp3[1])/3.0, (wp1[2]+wp2[2]+wp3[2])/3.0 );
00888         else // ras
00889             pid = points->InsertNextPoint( -(wp1[0]+wp2[0]+wp3[0])/3.0, -(wp1[1]+wp2[1]+wp3[1])/3.0, (wp1[2]+wp2[2]+wp3[2])/3.0 );
00890 
00891         valueGFA = this->ComputeGFA(Point( (p1.x()+p2.x()+p3.x())/3.0, (p1.y()+p2.y()+p3.y())/3.0, (p1.z()+p2.z()+p3.z())/3.0 ));
00892         gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00893         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00894     }
00895 
00896     lines->InsertNextCell(line);
00897     m_fiber->SetPoints(points);
00898     m_fiber->SetLines(lines);
00899     m_fiber->GetPointData()->SetScalars(gfa);
00900 }
00901 
00902 void ParticleFilter::saveFiber(int label, unsigned int step, Point begin)
00903 {
00904     // Save VTK PolyData object into VTK file
00905     std::stringstream filename;
00906     filename << "fiber-" << label << "-" << begin << "-" << m_dirNum << "-" << step << ".vtk";
00907 
00908     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter> writer = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter>::New();
00909     writer->SetInput(m_fiber);
00910     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00911     writer->SetFileTypeToBinary();
00912     writer->Write();
00913 }

00915 vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> ParticleFilter::GetFiber()
00916 {
00917     return m_fiber;
00918 }
00919 
00920 void ParticleFilter::ComputeMap()
00921 {
00922     for(std::vector<Particle>::iterator particle = m_cloud.begin(); particle != m_cloud.end(); particle++)
00923     {
00924 
00925         for(unsigned int k=0; k<=particle->length(); k++)
00926         {
00927             // Get data
00928             assert(k <= particle->length());
00929             Point p = particle->getPoint(k);
00930 //            Real  w = (k == 0) ? 1.0/(Real)m_M : particle->getWeight(k-1);
00931             Real w  = 1;
00932 
00933             // Tri-linear interpolation
00934             short x = (short)std::floor(p.x());
00935             short y = (short)std::floor(p.y());
00936             short z = (short)std::floor(p.z());
00937 
00938             Real wx = (Real)(p.x() - x);
00939             Real wy = (Real)(p.y() - y);
00940             Real wz = (Real)(p.z() - z);
00941 
00942             // Set particle's weight at particle's position
00943             Image::IndexType index;
00944 
00945             index[0] = x; index[1] = y; index[2] = z;
00946             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00947                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00948                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00949                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + (1-wz)*(1-wx)*(1-wy) * w);
00950 
00951             index[0] = x; index[1] = y+1; index[2] = z;
00952             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00953                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00954                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00955                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + (1-wz)*(1-wx)*wy * w);
00956 
00957             index[0] = x+1; index[1] = y; index[2] = z;
00958             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00959                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00960                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00961                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + (1-wz)*wx*(1-wy) * w);
00962 
00963             index[0] = x+1; index[1] = y+1; index[2] = z;
00964             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00965                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00966                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00967                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + (1-wz)*wx*wy * w);
00968 
00969             index[0] = x; index[1] = y; index[2] = z+1;
00970             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00971                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00972                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00973                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + wz*(1-wx)*(1-wy) * w);
00974 
00975             index[0] = x; index[1] = y+1; index[2] = z+1;
00976             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00977                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00978                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00979                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + wz*(1-wx)*wy * w);
00980 
00981             index[0] = x+1; index[1] = y; index[2] = z+1;
00982             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00983                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00984                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00985                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + wz*wx*(1-wy) * w);
00986 
00987             index[0] = x+1; index[1] = y+1; index[2] = z+1;
00988             if(0 <= (unsigned int)index[0] && (unsigned int)index[0] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0) &&
00989                0 <= (unsigned int)index[1] && (unsigned int)index[1] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1) &&
00990                0 <= (unsigned int)index[2] && (unsigned int)index[2] < m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2))
00991                 m_map->SetPixel(index, m_map->GetPixel(index) + wz*wx*wy * w);
00992         }
00993     }
00994 }
00995 
00996 void ParticleFilter::saveConnectionMap(int label, Point begin)
00997 {
00998     // Normalize image
00999     ImageIterator it(m_map, m_map->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
01000 
01001     Real max = 0;
01002     for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
01003     {
01004         if(max < it.Get())
01005             max = it.Get();
01006     }
01007 
01008     for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
01009         it.Set( it.Get() / max );
01010 
01011 
01012     //
01013     // Write data
01014     //
01015 
01016     // Write connectivity map
01017     ImageWriter::Pointer writer = ImageWriter::New();
01018 
01019     std::stringstream filename;
01020     filename << "map-" << label << "-" << begin << "-" << m_dirNum << "-" << m_k << ".nii.gz";
01021     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
01022     writer->SetInput(m_map);
01023 
01024     try
01025     {
01026         writer->Update();
01027     }
01028     catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
01029     {
01030         std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
01031         std::cout << err << std::endl;
01032     }
01033 }
01034 
01035 Image::Pointer ParticleFilter::GetConnectionMap()
01036 {
01037     return m_map;
01038 }
01039 
01040 void ParticleFilter::SetLPSOn()
01041 {
01042     m_lps = true;
01043 }
